briefdescription.para: Initialisation function, retrieves the overlays from the given overlay cache.

parameterdescription.para: Tells if this is the first pass.

simplesect.para: The elapsed time for this frame.

briefdescription.para: Used to add to the GPU time, the time elapsed between now and the last call of either endGpuTask or endCpuTask.
Used to add to the GPU time, the time elapsed between now and the last call of either endGpuTask or endCpuTask.
Fills the parameters with all passes times, in nanoseconds.
